event.title: Bill Van Dyk born.
event.description: Bill Van Dyk, Canadian Fool, 1956-2012

event.title: Billy goes to Holland
event.description: With mom. Uncle William buys me a train set. We were there for Dec 6 Xmas in Holland

event.title: Grade 9.
event.description: Home room teacher probably James Zyl.

event.title: Jackie Veenhof
event.description: One grade below me, ran 12.2 100 meters.

event.title: Laidlaw Transport
event.description: Got job through Harvey, a drunk, who lived upstairs with Gloria and Suzie.

event.title: Beacon wins first soccer championship.
event.description: At Hamilton -- or was that merely a playoff (happened during Canada-U.S.S.R. Hockey Summit.

event.title: Laura Dommasch Born.
event.description: Not confirmed. But she looks about a year older than Grant in pix-- not two years.

event.title: Grant Dommasch Born.
event.description: This is the right date. Therefore photos...

event.title: Christine Van Dyk (Peter and Sheryl) born.
Beacon wins second soccer championship.
event.description: Probably at Eden Christian in Niagara-on-the-Lake.

event.title: Saw Bob Dylan and the Band, Maple Leaf Gardens.
event.description: Exact date: Toronto, with Lambert Zuidevaart. Confirmed that it was Zuidevaart - yearbook teacher pix.

event.title: Graduate High School.
event.description: I think Martin Bakker was valedictorian. I had no plans for college at this time.

event.title: Living in Chicago
event.description: While attending Trinity Christian College

event.title: Lived and worked on campus.
event.description: cutting grass and watching Terry Boerema sunbathe.

event.title: Dodge Dart!
event.description: Bought from John Hedlin for $100.

event.title: Karin made me breakfast and read 'Helter Skelter' on the floor.
event.description: Wearing her blue baby dolls, and she sat on the floor and kept reading as I ate.

event.title: I was at ICS conference near Fort Erie-- Helen has picture of me with guitar.
event.description: I may have driven with Rick Vanderwoude, and I think we went to my parent\'s house.

event.title: Nancy, Ralph, Charles, Joanne Koole, Nell Hotke, Alice Bos. etc. arrive at TCC
event.description: Who else? Can\'t remember right now.

event.title: Piet\'s wedding.
event.description: Helen, Irene, Jackie, Alice Vanderhoek, Cathy De Peuter, Mark Vandervennen, Henry Bruinsma, Charlie Kooger, Dorothe Ellens.

event.title: Living in Chicago- sophomore year.
event.description: While attending Trinity Christian College

event.title: Meine Visser, Dave Guerrin, Laura Venema, etc. ?
event.description: Brian Gesch, Alice Bos, Nell Hotke, Henk Bruinsma, Kathy Van Drunen, who else? Can\'t remember right now.

event.title: Ellen Kok
event.description: How the marginal works against us.

event.title: John Calvin and the Calvinettes
event.description: with Irene, Marcia, and Ellen.

event.title: Calgary
event.description: Worked for United Grain Growers

event.title: In St. Davids-- quit TCC to go to Holland.
event.description: Stayed home and read and didn\'t do much else until I had my passport.

event.title: Helen in Holland.
event.description: I visited some time in February, I think. Then met up with Irene Smit.

event.title: In Holland.
event.description: Travelling, met Irene Smit who chickened out.

event.title: In Calgary, working for UGG.
event.description: Few memories of this time period, other than Edmonton trip! Strange interregum.

data.event: Stayed with Sjane Heerema, then had an apartment on hill over-looking downtown.

event.title: Joyce Kooger, Karin Schat, Randy Kok, arrive at TCC
event.description: Janet Molenaar, Anita Verwoerd.

data.event: Who else? Can\'t remember right now. Karin and I almost immediately have a big argument over German culpability for the holocaust, during which she slapped my face.

event.title: Trinity Christian College: Junior Year.
event.description: Room-mate: Henk Bruinsma, top floor, South Hall; Sid was suite mate, I believe. Karin and Joyce arrive.

event.title: Ghost of Frigid Hysterics
event.description: The loss of innocent desire by corrupted Carolina, 1978-1995

event.title: Toilet on roof.
event.description: There is a photo. Iron-clad: in one photo, Randy holds the Sep 20, 1976 issue of Time Magazine - After Mao!

data.event: See 1976-1977 yearbook! Trinity Christian College: Junior Year.

event.title: Helen graduates and moves to Chatham to teach.
event.description: Lived with Ann in apartment on Forest Street.

event.title: TCC Senior Year.
event.description: Single room; Hans De Mildt. Gwendy Kooger.

event.title: Joyce Goes for it!
event.description: The calculation of demented cross-over submission.

event.title: Ann snorks it!
event.description: The calculation of demented cross-over submission.

event.title: Last Day in Chicago
event.description: Moved to Chatham.

event.title: Marriage 35 - Years
event.description: Helen Edith Schat - Bill Van Dyk

event.title: Lived at 147 Forest St. Chatham (Mrs. Curtin).
event.description: We must have moved by November - Christmas was at our house.

event.title: Taught at Chatham District Christian.
event.description: Henry Kooy was principal.

event.title: 221 Forest St. Apartment.
event.description: A small apartment on second floor.

event.title: Writing and subbing occasionally.
event.description: For Henry Kooy.

event.title: Barb Schouten lived with us.
event.description: She got married that summer.

event.title: Taught at Chatham District Christian.
event.description: For Henry Kooy, then Herman Proper.

event.title: 1972 Plymouth Valiant.
event.description: Helen\'s dad bought it with help from George Antuma, for Helen. There is a picture dated August 83, in our house on 112 O\'Neill St.

event.title: 1981 Dodge van.
event.description: We still had the Valiant! Confirmed! There is a picture, obviously because we just bought it, in negatives 198111a.

event.title: Lived at 112 O\'Neil St.
event.description: Rented at first, then purchased from Ray Vandersluis mom

data.event: She gave us an exceptionally good deal because we taught at the Christian Schools.

event.title: Cottage near Parry Sound
event.description: With Karin, Jun, Fred and Henny, Aafke, Douwe.

data.event: I don't think Anne was there, at least not for the whole week.

event.title: Lada.
event.description: Which we drove to Chicago in October. Not sure when we sold it to Len Moelker and bought Fairmont.

event.title: Recording on Fostex 250.
event.description: Rented from Strings and Things, using Casio for beat, original songs.

event.title: Apple IIc: my first computer.
event.description: Bought from MicroAge.

data.event: I was absolutely the first person I knew to buy a personal computer.

event.title: Volunteered St. Leonards Society - Ron Grainger.
event.description: I would have been employed at the half-way house, but they didn\'t get off the ground.

event.title: Worked at Lester B. Pearson Centre in Chatham.
event.description: For Julie Farrell, who connived her way into the position.

event.title: Worked at Erie Glass for Ron Stronks.
event.description: With a Postma-- not Steve, I think. Nice guy.

event.title: Women\'s Centre - Linda, Joy Pyymaki... in Chatham.
event.description: started with Trinity project... very strange situation.

event.title: Malibu.
event.description: There is a picture dated then showing the Malibu in driveway.

event.title: 1978 Ford Fairmont.
event.description: Hard to find a picture but the Malibu replaced it and it\'s definitely there by 1989-07. Helen had an accident with it 1989-06.

event.title: 116 Tissiman Ave. Chatham
event.description: Bought house from Tolsmas.

event.title: Recording 'Good Question' in Barnyard Studios, Blenheim
event.description: Recorded with Brad Davis, Fred Feyen, Paul Vanderkooy, Lara Schat.
event.caption: This is the event's caption attribute.

event.description: With Lara and Greg Groen, Brad Davis, Fred Feyen, Paul Vanderkooy

event.title: Cabaret with Theatre Kent
event.description: With Noreen Donnell, Steve Donnell, Steve Repuski, Erica Henderson.

event.title: 14 Murray Hill Court, Kitchener
event.description: Moved there from Chatham, until move to 11 Ramblewood Way 1999.
event.caption: This is the event's caption attribute.

event.title: Working for CH
event.description: After interview with Don Janzen, then Murray MacKenzie and Noel Churchman

event.title: 1984 Honda Accord.
event.description: Added 2nd car for Helen.

event.title: 4Runner. When end?.
event.description: It replaced the 1982 Malibu. We then acquired Camry about same time?

event.title: Vacation in Nova Scotia with Paul, Christopher, Danielle.
event.description: Including Bay of Fundy, Halifax, Cape Breton, and PEI. Not exact dates here. We did go whale-watching twice.

data.event: The second time whale-watching with a kind of crazy guy in a smaller inflatable boat.

event.title: Moved to 11 Ramblewood Way.
event.description: Mikes movers, to very late. Mortgage paid off February 2012.

event.title: Saw Blue Rodeo in Toronto, Ontario Place.
event.description: Ran into Rick and Stacey who were also there. Dated picture.

event.title: Vacation in New York City with Paul and Danielle.
event.description: Sinister conspiracy to deceive us all.

data.event: We did the bus tour, which was actually fun-- we had a good guide. Then a boat tour around Manhattan island. Greenwhich village, WTC, Central Park where we found Lennon's memorial.

event.title: Vacation in Boston.
event.description: Actually, to a motel in a small town north of Boston, York Beach, at Cutty Sark Hotel.

event.title: Helen donates kidney.
event.description: At St. Michael\'s in Toronto. One week recovery

event.title: Trip to BC with Al and Ann.
event.description: Ending on Vancouver Island at Karin\'s birthday party near Comox.

data.event: There was a bizarre incident with one of Karin's close friends-- an inappropriate kiss or something.

event.title: Trip to Washington DC.
event.description: Ending on Vancouver Island at Karin\'s birthday party near Comox.

event.title: Vacation in BC with Christopher and Danielle.
event.description: Including Vancouver, Tofino, Vernon.

event.title: ICS Conference, Rinke, Sonya.
event.description: Was this the year I played in the band?

event.title: Totalled Accord near Peterborough.
event.description: Blacked out while driving towards Peterborough for Front Page training.

data.event: Just started hyperventilating and failed to pull over. Wandered across the median into opposing traffic lanes, then ended up in the grass median. Really quite scary. I was charged with careless driving and fought it in court in Peterborough and successfully had it reduced to inappropriate use of the median or something. Quite an interesting day at the courthouse watching other people going through the justice system.

event.title: Upgraded motherboard, new scanner, new lcd screen at home.
event.description: Added lots of ram to handle CS6.
